meanings.definition: A plan or suggestion put forward for consideration or discussion.
meanings.sent1: The team presented their proposals for the new project during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: She carefully reviewed all the proposals before making a decision.
meanings.sent3: The proposals for a surprise party were almost ruined when the guest of honor walked in early.
meanings.sent4: His proposals were like seeds planted in the minds of his colleagues, waiting to grow into great ideas.
meanings.sent5: The colorful visual aids made the proposals stand out and capture everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of making a proposal.
meanings.sent1: Her proposals were always well thought out and presented with confidence.
meanings.sent2: The proposals for the new policy were discussed at length in the board meeting.
meanings.sent3: The proposals for a new playground design sparked a friendly competition among the architects.
meanings.sent4: His proposals were like arrows hitting the target, precise and effective.
meanings.sent5: The proposals were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly together to form a complete picture.

meanings.sent1: He nervously rehearsed his proposals before finally asking her to marry him.
meanings.sent2: The romantic proposals under the starry sky left her speechless.
meanings.sent3: His proposals were so elaborate that she couldn't help but say yes.
meanings.sent4: The proposals of love bloomed like flowers in the garden of their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The heartfelt proposals echoed in her mind, filling her with joy and excitement.
